Obama stands with Islam , not America . Saudi Arabia funds Islamist terror outside of Saudi Arabia , it just does not want that inside of Saudi Arabia . Think of it as funding a pack of wild dogs , and keeping a fence to keep those rabid animals out of your yard . ISIS is cannon fodder to fight the Shia , and everyone else Saudi Arabia considers , a threat . Disposable proxy army .
